name: DungeonCleaner
description:
What's this? -  This is my entry for the Minijam 98,  Developed in under 3 Days on stream.

 Dungeon Cleaner is a tiny Roguelike where you have to get rid of dungeon monsters with bubbles

Hints-  Some PowerUps are "Negative", If you get lost, just do some BackTracking and try to open other doors

Extra- The Character's name is "Bobbly"

clean up all the dungeon rooms with your sparky bubbles
